node.name: PDE Plus
node.shortdescription:
Part of my day I'm working on some cool OSGi server stuff. While doing this I came across a few issues with PDE. Mostly they are around launching and self-hosting. PDE Plus is a patch for PDE that addresses a few.

As with all my Open Source engagements, I just don't stop after reporting issues. I also take the time to analyze them and provide patches. Why? Well, it saves me a lot of time in the end because I don't need to live with workarounds. :)

Here is a list of patches produced so far for Eclipse PDE 3.7.0 and included:

  • Bug 326059 - [launch] [patch] Add Eclipse Product launch configuration type for true product configuration launches
  • Bug 315061 - [patch] Should read start levels from bundles.info of target platform when launching Eclipse application
  • Bug 315039 - [patch] Eclipse launch configuration should inherit properties from target platform
  • Bug 314619 - [patch] org.eclipse.equinox.app is not started when using Eclipse Application launcher

Now, thanks to Eclipse it's also possible to easily share these patches with you.
node.body:
Part of my day I'm working on some cool OSGi server stuff. While doing this I came across a few issues with PDE. Mostly they are around launching and self-hosting. PDE Plus is a patch for PDE that addresses a few.

As with all my Open Source engagements, I just don't stop after reporting issues. I also take the time to analyze them and provide patches. Why? Well, it saves me a lot of time in the end because I don't need to live with workarounds. :)

Here is a list of patches produced so far for Eclipse PDE 3.7.0 and included:

  • Bug 326059 - [launch] [patch] Add Eclipse Product launch configuration type for true product configuration launches
  • Bug 315061 - [patch] Should read start levels from bundles.info of target platform when launching Eclipse application
  • Bug 315039 - [patch] Eclipse launch configuration should inherit properties from target platform
  • Bug 314619 - [patch] org.eclipse.equinox.app is not started when using Eclipse Application launcher

Now, thanks to Eclipse it's also possible to easily share these patches with you.
